A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok\, the Mary Poppins in space and the viva Las Vegas was a bit much. Oh yeah\, THE question was a bit anti climactic. (Don't want to post a spoiler). I thought the movie was a great transition piece for a new generation and leaves many doors open for new characters and side stories like Rogue One\, etc. This movie helps exit some of the old in a good way and makes room for new. They need to broaden galaxy of characters. Another point\, they copy our history well where evil\, while on top\, often makes bad decisions to bring about their own demise bringing hope to those who fight evil.
